displayName: Agent for SAP - HANA Raw Metrics

timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
# Indicates the state of the Linux HA cluster state.# 
# -1: unclean state
# 0: shutdown
# 1: standby
# 2: online
# -10: unknown

fetch gce_instance
| metric 'workload.googleapis.com/sap/cluster/nodes'
| every 1m

# Indicates if the Linux HA cluster resource is up and running.
# 3: Master|Slave|Started
# 2: Starting
# 1: Stopped
# 0: Failed
# -10: Unknown

fetch gce_instance
| metric 'workload.googleapis.com/sap/cluster/resources'
| every 1m

# Numeric Response code for HANA system availability, designated by SAP System ID and SAP Instance Number.
# 1 = All processes are GREEN,
# 0 = One or more process not GREEN

fetch gce_instance
| metric 'workload.googleapis.com/sap/hana/availability'
| every 1m

# Numeric Response code for HANA system high availability state, designated by SAP System ID and SAP Instance Number.
# 4 = Primary online with replication running
# 3 = Primary online but replication is not fully functional
# 2 = Primary has error
# 1 = Current node is Secondary
# 0 = Unknown state


fetch gce_instance
| metric 'workload.googleapis.com/sap/hana/ha/availability'
| every 1m

# Numeric Response code for HANA system replication.
# 0 = Error occurred
# 10 = Replication is off (standalone mode)
#  12 = Replication is Active, this is a secondary node
# 15 = Replication is Active, Initialization or sync with the primary is complete and the secondary is continuously replicating.

fetch gce_instance
| metric 'workload.googleapis.com/sap/hana/ha/replication'
| every 1m

# Numeric Response code for HANA service availability.
# Response code 0 = Service is not running
# Response code 1 = Service is running 

 fetch gce_instance::workload.googleapis.com/sap/hana/service
| window 1m
